org.jruyi.io

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruyi.io.Filter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFilter

    public abstract class Filter
extends Object
implements IFilter
    This abstract class provides pass-through implementation of IFilter.
